Categories: Social Media, Social Media Advertising, Social Media Marketing
Description: Social Network and Advertising Platform with a Mobile App and two Web applications
Full Description: We are used to recognizing things from their appearance, visually, but everything has a sound inside. SoundsOfThings (SoT) is a sound based social network and an advertising platform: SoT represents the end of the Visual Advertising. The Social Media Advertising (ADV) is based on Visual content (images, video or text) and mobile visual ADV spending has surpassed TV ADV spending in 2018 (eMarketers) BUT, soon all of us will stop watching our smartphone screen because we will to with them due to the advent of voice assistants (Alexa, Siri, Google, Cortana); in this scenario the opportunity is to leverage the Audio to advertise products and services. Moving from Visual to Audio has an impact to the entire ADV sector (USD 600B worldwide). SoundsOfThings (SoT) has designed a new Social Network based on Audio contents. SoT is also an Audio based ADV platform working online and offline. In SoT people socialize using the Sound Emotion (SE) and Brands interact with users using the Sound Villages (SV). The SE is the audio based content and the SV is the way brands do campaigns in SoT. The SoT business model is based on performance marketing (similar to the other social networks based on sponsored contents) with an important news: it will be multichannel online and offline (standard social media operates only online).  SoT has as target markets USA and EMEA; SoT will be the first Audio Social Media with a global impact proposing a credible and easy to adopt alternative to the Visual ADV in a scenario where, in USA for example, “In 2018 nearly all (92%) of small businesses invested more time and money in at least one social media platform”. Global advertising expenditure is predicted to reach $581 billion at the end of 2018, with most of the growth coming from sponsored content in search engines and social media ads, according to industry forecaster Zenith (Reuters). Competitors of SoT are Facebook/Instagram and Snapchat. Snapchat became a star VS Instagram and Facebook despite inside Snapchat users can post Images and Video, exactly like in Facebook and Instagram! SoT changes completely the game, no more Images/Videos but SEs where the sound comes first and engage more the user because he is forced to imagine (audio stimulates imagination). the COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGEs of SoT are 1.The content: it  is no more Visual but Audio based (the Sound Emotion): a game changing in all the ADV sector:  1.1BBC “Can a brand create a 'sonic identity' from light bulbs?”  https://bbc.in/2SQFr9f   1.2Marc Andreessen “Audio Will Be Titanically important” https://tcrn.ch/2LXosQf  2. More engagement for the users: listening to a sound normally recall memories 3.First social offline: SoT is the first social network able to set up a sponsored content offline (SoT uses ‘GPSe = GPS-SE’ geo-localised Sound Emotion that users can listen only being in the place where the SE has been created; in this way SoT is able to generate real User traffic in Real places -retails- using digital contents) SoT had a great launch in Italy from Sept to Dec 2018, it was the perfect test bench before the international Launch. SoT has generated a 1k user community and has now two clients: Eni gas e luce (1s energy provider in Italy that with SoT has created a campaign based on the sound of energy) and Pardgroup spa operating in the field-marketing sector. SoT now needs to grow the community (with the community brands will come) and to do so the plan is to launch in USA.

Description: Hyper-local Air Pollutant Mapping Systems for Ground & Aerial Vehicles
Full Description: Traditional monitoring stations typically only provide for air pollutant concentrations at city or district level, and so it is unknown how the pollutants are distributed within such areas. This lack of information prevents people from making effective and conscious decisions regarding the air quality impacting their work and daily lives. Our team is here to change that.   Soarability Technologies (previously known as SciflyTech) was founded by a group of people with extensive experience in sensors and mechatronic systems development from University of Auckland in New Zealand. We dedicate ourselves to developing advanced ‘nose’ and ‘brain’ for drones and ground vehicles. Our products and technologies enable aerial and ground vehicles to accurately collect, analyze and visualize hyper-local air pollutant information, supporting decision makings by governments, organizations, research groups, and individuals alike.   Our Sniffer4D™ and Sniffer4D Mapper™ have been used internationally in different industrial applications. Users of Sniffer4D include University of Macau,  HKUST, HUST, SINOPEC, BP, many municipal environmental protection agencies in China, and professional drone service providers worldwide. Sniffer4D and Sniffer4D Mapper continue to set industrial benchmarks in this niche environmental market.

Description: Solvotrin Therapeutics is a pharmaceutical company that focuses on improving and enhancing existing medications.
Full Description: Solvotrin Therapeutics Limited is a privately held pharmaceutical company focused on cardiovascular applications. Solvotrin’s business model is based on the development of new drugs that combine its unique patented prodrug platform with well established compounds in large markets. Its approach of chemically creating new chemical entities from existing compounds for synergistic benefits creates efficacy and safety advantages with significantly reduced development timeline and development risk. Solvotrin’s lead compound, ST0702 is a nicotinic acid prodrug, with significant efficacy and tolerability advantages over similar products for 54 dyslipidaemia. ST0701 is a bioactivated form of aspirin, which addresses the well documented gastrointestinal toxicity of aspirin. ST0703 is a ’nitro-aspirin‘ prodrug with dual antiplatelet effects and disease modifying potential. The company has a strong intellectual property underpin with patent protection at the highest, New Molecule level. Solvotrin’s strategy is to take its compounds to the end of Phase I and to partner the development and commercialisation phases with large pharmaceutical companies.

Categories: Apps, Digital Marketing, Marketing, Music, Social, Software
Description: Social Genius is a data analytics software company helping brands better spend their marketing dollars.
Full Description: This team makes tools for everyone interested in discovering or sharing preferences and content in a more rewarding and social setting--not just online but also in person.  Their first product, AudioVroom, makes music discovery easy enough that a single click starts a playlist based on user's preferences (derived from music listening history stored on the device or elsewhere).  This tool also allows friends to share music preferences by bumping phones which results in a new playlist based on their common taste.  Another feature, DJ, allows everyone in the room to bump with one device and crowd-source the next playlist.   Many of these activities add to the user's point history.  The more active users not only listen for free for a longer period, but also have the opportunity to become tastemakers, collect badges and start or influence group sessions.   The AudioVroom service is supported by the Echo Nest as well as 7Digital. The team recently introduced (at San Francisco Music Hack Day) an HTML5 version of AudioVroom, the DJ version that works with any computer, as well as a Lollapalooza concert profile as one example of how AudioVroom can be used as a marketing tool by artists and event organizers.  Each of the three core team members has over 14 years of experience in his/her field, and brings expertise in consumer technology development, wireless networking, information security, music analytics, business development and operations.

Description: Soundtracker is a geosocial mobile music network enabling users to track the music their friends and neighbors listen to in real time.
Full Description: DESCRIPTION Soundtracker makes it easy to discover the music your friends and your neighbors are listening to. Use Soundtracker to comment on your friends' stations, chat, check their latest stations, and more. Discover your city's favorite artists. Access any artist, any genre from the largest music catalog on Internet radio with more than 32M songs for FREE. Create your own radio stations and share them with your friends via Facebook, Twitter and Foursquare. FUNDING We are looking for other 2M euro in convertible debt (at 4 % rate annually) in a second round  to continue growing (proposals from VC's are welcome).  Contact Daniele Calabrese daniele@soundtracker.fm.   OUR PROJECT FOR ANALYTICS  Soundtracker offers a unique opportunity to exploit rich data streams containing hidden knowledge about many valuable aspects.  Mobile Carriers  Information as locations, traffic volume, traffic throughput can be combined to build on-the-fly models to predict what is going to happen.  Media Companies  Data collected comprises aspects related to: (i) music preferences – type(s) of music listened by users; (ii) habits related to locations – where do they listen to music; (iii) use patterns – e.g. how often do they listen to music; (iv) reasoning – an interesting question to answer would be why do user do what and where they do; (v) locations – discover tastes about places where music is listened more frequently.  Music Labels  By aggregating data differently we feed music labels campaigns in order to support the promotion of music artists based on information about locations/type of music/ frequency patterns of music listening by our users community.

Description: Sorbisense A/S engages in developing, manufacturing, and marketing technology for water quality monitoring.
Full Description: Sorbisense A/S engages in developing, manufacturing, and marketing technology for water quality monitoring. Its technology enables flow-proportional monitoring of nitrate, phosphorous, and xenobiotics in drains, lakes, ponds, and streams, as well as groundwater, drinking water, and industrial wastewater. The company also offers SorbiCell, a porous cratridge, which is used to measure groundwater, lakes and streams, drain and sewage pipes, and pressurized pipes; SorbiSystems that are reusable mountings for various applications; and ground water sampler(GWS), which is used for sampling below groundwater level in wells or ponds. In addition, it provides GWS Flex for sampling narrow wells or for difficult conditions; InStream for sampling in streaming water; and Socket for sampling from drain and sewage pipes, as well as for sampling drains submerged under water table. Further, the company offers services, such as customized products, project solutions, laboratory tests, training courses, and application notes. Sorbisense offers its products for applications, such as performing risk analyses, early-warning monitoring systems, evaluating emissions from in-situ remediation operations, environmental fate studies, and environmental accounting. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Tjele, Denmark.

Description: Revolutionizing the News and Information Sphere
Full Description: The world of news in this era of digitization is replete with several problems and challenges which consequently affect the way people access and view news. They include fake news and the lack of a news app that aggregates varying categories of news in one space. The (SORS) app is a news aggregation app that filters information according to the choices, topics, and interest of the users from over 300 reliable sources (including TV channels, radio channel, magazines, websites, etc.) in the UK.  With SORS, several unique features can be said to differentiate our product and give it an edge over existing news apps in the market. Also, the app has 14 categories (including World News, UK News, Politics, Business, Sport, Science, Health, Celebrities, Technology, Lifestyle, Fashion, Beauty, Weird, and Auto) and over 40 sub-categories including but not limited to (stock market, Fintech, football, Gaming, forex, etc.)  in addition to that SORS has local detailed news for 70 cities and towns in UK, SORS app also leverages on Artificial Intelligence which makes it easy for users to view news and information based on their internet history and interest.

Description: SoChatti brings you chocolate from around the world.
Full Description: SoChatti brings you chocolate from around the world, crafted to maintain its distinct and complex flavors, and packaged to be enjoyed on demand. Should chocolate makers have an experience superior to their customers? We didn’t think so. SoChatti set out to change what is considered to be the typical “chocolate experience" and reinvent a new consumer product created through a fully integrated process of crafting and delivering chocolate. To a chocolate maker, chocolate is best consumed warm, drawing out flavors and aromas characteristic of origins around the world. To most people, however, chocolate is a solid that quickly loses its unique flavors after brief exposure to the air. Our process, packaging and dispensing further preserves the cocoa bean's unique and coveted flavor that before was only available to chocolate makers and that are lost during traditional chocolate manufacturing.

Description: SoundCure develops and commercializes novel acoustic therapies for the treatment and suppression of tinnitus.
Full Description: SoundCure is focused on developing and commercializing a novel acoustic therapy for the treatment and suppression of tinnitus (ringing in the ear).  The company will partner with audiologists, MD's and patient advocacy groups, and leverage innovative web-based technologies to treat patients and provide tinnitus solutions. Tinnitus is a debilitating disease that affects an estimated 262 million people worldwide.  It is believed that over 17% of the general population suffers from tinnitus and based on a recent report from the Department of Veterans Affairs, tinnitus is now the #1 disability affecting returning troops. While tinnitus can affect anyone, it is more common with increasing age and occurs at higher rates with individuals who work in noisy environments. SoundCure was formed by Allied Minds based on technology first pioneered by researchers at UC Irvine who discovered a relation between certain tonal algorithms and specific therapeutic effects.

During exploration, the avatar raises systematic questions for planning, problem-solving, explaining etc. endowing the user with sound reasoning practices in the context of real-world challenges. This real-world challenge grounding, differentiates LEX from test SaaS (SAT, GRE, LSAT, MCAT etc), solution SaaS (Wolfram Mathematica, MatLab, AXIOM etc), and brain trainers (Lumosity, Games).

Description: Sortd is the world's first email-organizing “Smart-Skin” for Gmail.
Full Description: Sortd transforms the email Inbox into a set of organized To-Do lists.  It brings conversations, tasks and priorities together into one intuitive, visually-organized workspace, that's really easy to use and works right inside Gmail. People live in their Inbox but using it to stay on top of things is a chaotic way to work. Most of us have developed less than desirable workarounds in our efforts to stay on top of email (flagging, marking emails as unread, even emailing ourselves to remember important stuff).  The inbox wasn’t meant to be a To-Do list, but it's clear that email is not going away any time soon. Sortd is an 'Email 2.0' venture that re-thinks email and brings a new approach to the way people work.

Categories: Consulting, Direct Marketing, Direct Sales, Management Consulting, Marketing, Sales
Description: South Matrix is a marketing agency that offers marketing and sales services to firms in the telecommunication industry.
Full Description: South Matrix, a leading direct marketing & sales firm, leads the Baton Rouge market in customer acquisition & service. We are diligent, energetic, competitive, and team-centered. We believe our early success as a company revolves around the people we work with and their development. Our team is dynamic, coming from various backgrounds. Our common ground lies in our passion for growth and desire to raise the bar. For that reason, we like to describe our company as a leadership development firm that just happens to do sales. Our success has lead us to be fortunate enough to work with some of the leading telecommunications, solar, energy, satellite, cable, and internet firms and we’re only growing our client base.  People may ask themselves, why do these name brand companies want to outsource their marketing? There are numerous reasons but the two ones we find most important are: time and money. In outsourcing their direct marketing team to South Matrix, we lower the overhead cost for these firms. They no longer worry about recruiting costs, hiring and onboarding costs, training costs, retaining costs, and sales quotas. South Matrix gives them back all the time and energy they would have spent to build their team. Now, instead of worrying about expanding their market share with a skilled and motivated sales team, they get to reinvest their time in building a better and newer product.  Why do these companies trust us so much, though? Simple: they have seen our systems and strategies work first-hand and know how systematic our company truly is. We stay up-to-date on product knowledge, training methods, and leadership teachings, and instill our team with the skills to be their best. Instead of focusing our training strictly on getting the sale, we teach our people how to communicate effectively, actively listen, and assess the situation quickly with a level-head. Our goal as a company is to develop leaders who will impact their community. By shifting our focus on our people, our people shift their focus and look to deliver their best performance every day because they become personally invested in their results. The sales always follow.

Description: Sonect is a location based matchmaking platform connecting those who want to withdraw cash, with those who want to deposit it.
Full Description: SONECT enables every shop in the neighborhood to act as a “virtual ATM” using just a smartphone or its POS-system. SONECT is a location-based matchmaking platform that connects those who want to withdraw cash with those who want to deposit cash – typically a local shop owner. It builds a community around local businesses and helps them generate physical leads.  Using SONECT: • local shops will not only have less cash to manage at the end of the day but also earn a commission & attract new customers by offering a new service and having access to an additional marketing channel • individuals can avoid an extra trip to the ATM and withdraw money without fees at the click of a button – wherever they are: in a restaurant, a bar, their favorite local shop, …  • banks can reduce ATM operation costs & complement their ATM network – or even enter new markets without investing significant capital. On top of that, they can leverage a new revenue channel and get closer to their customers.

Full Description: SolariPhy develops a clean, innovative, patent protected technology that enables significant improvement in the efficiency of photovoltaic (PV) cells. The technology is based on the ability to collect the Sun’s electromagnetic radiation unused by the PV cell that otherwise would dissipate as heat and by means of spectrum manipulation recycles it and feeds it back to the PV cell. SolariPhy technology enables the standard PV cells to make use of a larger portion of the energy delivered by the sun’s radiation. SolariPhy innovative technology can be applied to existing PV cells thus leverage existing, already installed, PV solar systems infrastructure as an add-on device or to be completely integrated with the PV cell itself forming the next generation of PV cells.

Description: SocialSamba operates an online scripted social networking platform that enables users to chat with fictional characters they love.
Full Description: SocialSamba is Facebook for fictional characters.  We enable fans to "friend" the characters they love from TV, books and movies, and experience what it is like to be part of a social network with those characters.  All of the content from the characters is scripted by professional writers (our customers like Warner Bros. or Disney), creating a highly engaging story that scales - written once, played back millions of times.  For example, we can enable teenage girls to "friend" the cast of Glee, and experience all of the excitement and drama that comes with dating the quarterback from the show, and going to the show's prom.  And the important thing is that this is built on a well established business model - virtual goods and product placement.  When the teenager goes to the prom, she has the opportunity to spend a few credits to get the really nice dress that "upgrades" the story.  We are basically doing for storytelling what Zynga did for gaming - same market size, same proven revenue stream, only we have characters that people want posting to their wall, as opposed to messages about virtual farm animals.

Description: Sober Grid is a digital health application focused on creating mobile communities that  engage people into chronic disease management.
Full Description: Sober Grid is digital health company focused on the chronic disease management of substance use disorders (SUD). Covering all chemical dependencies including but not limited to opioid use disorder (OUD), Alcohol Use Disorder (AUD), and Cocaine Use Disorder.  The application has been adopted in over 170 countries and has been used over 20 million times. The solution was developed in partnership with researchers from Harvard Medical School and University of Pennsylvania Perelman School of Medicine with support from the National Institutes of Health.  Researchers at UPenn Perelman School of Medicine found that the use of the Sober Grid app correlated with lower relapse rates.  At its core the app uses a unique community based approach for chronic disease management. While including proven concepts such as the use of contingency management when giving app members in app badges as rewards for their sobriety achievements.  The apps large user base and strong engagement metrics help provide large data sets that enable the Sober Grid predictive analytics to help predict an impending relapse risk. Depending on risk level a coach reaches out and delivers an intervention. Improving the overall  heath outcomes by reducing relapse rates with the combined use of AI and human connection.   - - Sober Grid Mobile App is a geo-social software application for iOS/Android smartphones. Sober Grid provides users with a GPS locator interface, direct messaging and newsfeed functionalities, certified and cost effective coaching with both regularly scheduled and crisis driven on demand access 24/7, daily educational and inspirational literature, daily quests for users to complete and maintain a consistent habit of focusing on getting healthier, and social supports in a single platform. Sober Grid allows users to find other sober people nearby: in their neighborhood, in an airport, on a cruise ship, and traveling for business or pleasure. Sober Grid provides an instant social network for sober people in recovery, a group that numbers more than 23 million in the United States alone.

Description: Social Finance US is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that is dedicated to mobilizing investment capital to drive social progress.
Full Description: Founded in January 2011, Social Finance US is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that is dedicated to mobilizing investment capital to drive social progress.  They believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to thrive, and that social impact financing can play a catalytic role in creating these opportunities. They are dedicated to designing public-private-nonprofit partnerships that tackle complex social challenges such as poverty, crime, education, health, and workforce success. As market intermediaries, they structure these partnerships by aligning the unique interest of all stakeholders – service recipients and providers, government and investors – to create innovative social financing solutions. This work reflects their commitment to driving social progress through a market-based approach, as well as their deep experience in the governmental, capital markets, social services, and philanthropy sectors. Core to their work is the development of Social Impact Bonds (SIBs), which draw upon private capital to fund effective interventions designed to address the needs of the underserved. Categories: Cloud Computing, Content, Music, Software, Video
Description: Sookbox is a cross-platform that enables users to virtually connect and control media from a handheld device.
Full Description: Sookbox provides a universal framework to connect and control media on all devices.  The goal of Sookbox is to empower users to enjoy their media on whatever device they choose, from the palm of their hand. At Sookbox, media access is organized by user, rather than by device or service. Devices should do what they are best at doing. Movies should be watched on a television, not a laptop. Music should be listened to through an amp and speakers, not computer speakers. And the remote control for everything should be a smartphone or tablet. The problem is that communication between these media outlets is difficult and onerous. Sookbox gives a cross-platform universal solution that goes beyond putting a smart app on a smart TV. Sookbox breaks from traditional thinking in two crucial ways: First is to put a cloud into homes, and the second is to serve content and controls separately. Sookbox provides a novel type of cloud service. The Sookbox uses stored or streamed content. It allows users to have their own physical server in their homes. This server, the Sookbox, allows a user to store content in their own "personal cloud." That is music, digital movies, and pictures on a single server. This idea is not unique, but it is powerfully packaged: media storage, distribution, and control - all centralized and layered in a single device. That gives you the power to use your iPhone to click “Goodfellas. Basement TV.” The core of the product line, the software of the cloud server, is a revolutionary type of web application development platform known as Harmony.  The current paradigm is a world where content and controls are in the same place. For example, the YouTube video controls are right next to the video and the back button is across the browser. Sookbox transcends that paradigm. Televisions are best for video, speakers are best for sound, and handheld devices are best for control. Now that Sookbox divides the cloud by user, it makes sense to serve multiple, different sites from a single web app. A fundamental Sookbox feature is that it does not compete with other cloud services or try to debunk them. Instead, it gives them a platform and a vessel to reach their current users in a friendlier, more powerful way. Harmony unleashes applications such as Pandora, Netflix and YouTube across a user’s home. For example, someone might want to develop a “Pandora Alarm Clock” app. The API allows developers to provide a single, connective user experience synchronized across multiple types of devices. On the developers' side, the Harmony libraries and structure allow them to serve independently content to content device(s) and controls to controlling device(s). By facilitating this two-way communication, Sookbox allows the navigation of media, the play/pause, volume, etc. to be displayed graphically on the handheld device and directly control the music coming out of the speakers. Sookbox can be viewed as a personal cloud. Personal meaning the user owns it personally, but also it is personalized. The cloud should be divided by user, not by device or by service. Sookbox opens a new layer between the other cloud services and the user that makes the experience personal and meaningful.

Sonar6 offers online performance management and succession planning solutions for companies.
Full Description: Based in Auckland, NZ and Sausalito, CA, Sonar6 has provided online performance management and succession planning solutions to companies around the world since 2004. Sonar6's stunning graphics-based approach to performance reviews has won numerous awards and plaudits including naming as a Gartner Cool Vendor and inclusion in HR Executive's Top Ten HR Products.

Description: Sociomantic Labs engages in Real-Time Bidding (RTB) and helps marketers drive incremental sales and grow Customer Lifetime Value (CLV).
Full Description: Founded in 2009, Sociomantic Labs empowers advertisers with a real-time and personalized system that delivers increased and transparent performance. Simply put, the company makes display advertising more intelligent. Sociomantic is a market leader in programmatic advertising and helps marketers drive incremental sales and grow Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) using today’s most advanced display advertising techniques, including: real-time retargeting and prospecting, stream-based data management, and dynamic ad personalization.  These technologies allow Sociomantic’s clients to reach new and existing customers with individually priced and personalized display ads. Real-time reporting enables clients to see results just milliseconds after they happen. All of these technologies work together to deliver unmatched performance on a global scale, with a dedication to exceptionally high standards of service delivered from 16 offices serving six continents.
